alert.note: Alert for Sampson (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 07 at 8:43PM EDT until August 07 at 9:30PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Sampson County in central North Carolina... * Until 930 PM EDT. * At 842 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lagoon, or 12 miles east of Elizabethtown, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Harrells and Ivanhoe. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: Straight line winds can blow down trees, power lines, and damage mobile homes and other buildings. Seek shelter in a sturdy structure until the storm has passed. Stay away from windows as flying debris generated by damaging winds can be deadly.
